abstract: Adrian Beltre joined a select fraternity when he blasted three home runs in a postseason game Tuesday, putting his name on a list that includes Babe Ruth, Reggie Jackson, George Brett and Adam Kennedy. Wait, Adam Kennedy?!?
snippet: Adrian Beltre joined a select fraternity when he blasted three home runs in a postseason game Tuesday, putting his name on a list that includes Babe Ruth, Reggie Jackson, George Brett and Adam Kennedy. Wait, Adam Kennedy?!?
lead_paragraph: Adrian Beltre joined a select fraternity when he blasted three home runs in a postseason game Tuesday against the Tampa Bay Rays in Game 4 of their American League division series. It's not every day you can add your name to a list that includes Babe Ruth, Reggie Jackson, George Brett and Adam Kennedy.

headline.main: Kennedy's Big Day Still an Aberration
